structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 374, sec. 4, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3010-8, 3010-9, 3010-13, 3010-18.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Sinking fund, control and use of -- Taxes for.
